item.title: Understanding Bible Societies: A Biblical Perspective
item.description:
Understanding Bible Societies: A Biblical Perspective

What is the purpose of a Bible society?

Bible societies are organizations committed to translating, printing, and distributing copies of God's Word. They aim to make the Bible accessible to everyone, often providing Bibles free of charge or at low cost. These organizations also â€¦
